name: I'm Fine (Nivja, widemouthfrog1, deenor)
description:
Play as Capy the Capybara in this platformer. Navigate your way through messages, meeting updates and deadline reminders. You got this… maybe…

Controls:

Arrow key or w,a,s,d for moving around. 

Space/ arrow up/ w to jump 

Made in 48 hours for Game Jam Aotearoa 2022

Programming  - Karl

Art - Tales

Game Design and Writing - Niva

Level design - Niva and Karl

Original music - Karl and Tales

Fonts by Google fonts

 

Character design inspired by Night in the Woods
